dmca.title: EV1-C1647288G] Copyright Infringment -Tapesh.com - Caltex
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Thursday, November 02, 2006 9:46 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [EV1-C1647288G] Copyright Infringment -Tapesh.com - Caltex Subject: [EV1-C1647288G] Copyright Infringment -Tapesh.com - Caltex ==== Original Message ==== (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) To Whom It may Concern: www.tapesh.com is placing and offering our musical copyrighted materials with no authorization from us. Therefore, we request their immediate removal. 1.. An electronic signature of the copyright owner, or a person authorized to act on behalf of the owner, of an exclusive copyright that has allegedly been infringed. We hereby certify under we are the legal owners of infringed musical compositions. If you require to have all signed statement, please provide us your fax number, we will fax it to you. 2.. Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed, or, if multiple copyrighted works at a single online site are covered by a single notification, a representative list of such works on that site. www.tapesh.com offers hundreds of our copyrighted sound-recordings and musical videos. Some links are as follow: http://www.tapesh.com/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=8&Itemid =15 once you click on an artist the player opens that shows no link 3.. Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing or to be the subject of infringing activity and that is to be removed or access to which is to be disabled, and information reasonably sufficient to permit Go Daddy to locate the material. http://www.tapesh.com/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=8&Itemid =15 once you click on an artist the player opens that shows no link 4.. Information reasonably sufficient to permit oftLayer to contact the Complaining Party, such as an address, telephone number, and, if available, an electronic mail address at which the Complaining Party may be contacted. Mehrdad Pakravan Caltex Records 9045-A Eton Avenue Canoga Park, CA 91304 USA Tel: 818-700-8657 Fax: 818-700-0285 Email: mehrdad@caltexrecords.com www.caltexrecords.com 5.. A statement that the Complaining Party has a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. I, Mehrdad Pakravan President of Caltex Records hereby testify under penalty of perjury that Caltex Records is sole owner of the albums / sound recordings attached to this statement and 100% of copyright ownership and publishing belongs to Caltex Records. We have not authorized - www.Persian4U.com to display, to promote, to solicit or to sell our copyrighted sound recordings on the internet. Signed by: Mehrdad Pakravan 6.. A statement that the information in the notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that the Complaining Party is the owner, or is authorized to act on behalf of the owner, of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. All above information is accurate and Caltex Records is the sole owner of the sound-recordings, audio and video and we have all exclusive perpetual worldwide right. I hope to have provided you all you need. Best regards. Mehrdad MIME element (text/html)
To Whom It may Concern:

www.tapesh.com is placing and offering our musical copyrighted materials with no authorization from us. Therefore, we request their immediate removal.

  1. An electronic signature of the copyright owner, or a person authorized to act on behalf of the owner, of an exclusive copyright that has allegedly been infringed. We hereby certify under we are the legal owners of infringed musical compositions. If you require to have all signed statement, please provide us your fax number, we will fax it to you.
  2. Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed, or, if multiple copyrighted works at a single online site are covered by a single notification, a representative list of such works on that site. www.tapesh.com offers hundreds of our copyrighted sound-recordings and musical videos. Some links are as follow:

    http://www.tapesh.com/index.php?option=com_conten t&task=view&id=8&Itemid=15 once you click on an artist the player opens that shows no link

     

  3. Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing or to be the subject of infringing activity and that is to be removed or access to which is to be disabled, and information reasonably sufficient to permit Go Daddy to locate the material.

    http://www.tapesh.com/index.php?option=com_conten t&task=view&id=8&Itemid=15 once you click on an artist the player opens that shows no link

     

         
  4. Information reasonably sufficient to permit oftLayer to contact the Complaining Party, such as an address, telephone number, and, if available, an electronic mail address at which the Complaining Party may be contacted.
    Mehrdad Pakravan
    Caltex Records
    9045-A Eton Avenue
    Canoga Park, CA 91304
    USA
    Tel: 818-700-8657
    Fax: 818-700-0285
    Email:     mehrdad@caltexrecords.com
    www.caltexrecords.com
  5. A statement that the Complaining Party has a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

    I, Mehrdad Pakravan President of Caltex Records hereby testify under penalty of perjury that Caltex Records is sole owner of the albums / sound recordings attached to this statement and 100% of copyright ownership and publishing belongs to Caltex Records. We have not authorized -      www.Persian4U.com 

     to display, to promote, to solicit or to sell our copyrighted sound recordings on the internet.

     Signed by:    Mehrdad Pakravan

  6. A statement that the information in the notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that the Complaining Party is the owner, or is authorized to act on behalf of the owner, of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. All above information is accurate and Caltex Records is the sole owner of the sound-recordings, audio and video and we have all exclusive perpetual worldwide right.
I hope to have provided you all you need.
 
Best regards.
Mehrdad
MIME element (text/plain)
